message: Target midpoint 48 for repeated trades. I’ll bid 58; you ask 38. If your cost >48, share your minimum acceptable midpoint and we’ll adjust.
My minimum acceptable midpoint is 61. Let's target 61; I'll ask 61, you bid 61 for repeated trades. Adjust if needed.
Trade at 61 was break-even. Let's target 65 midpoint for mutual benefit. I'll ask 65, you bid 65. If too high, share your max acceptable midpoint and we'll adjust.
65 is too high. Max acceptable midpoint 63. I’ll bid 63 each round; please ask 63. If you need a small premium once, we can alternate occasional 64, but default 63 for steady trades.
New cap midpoint 62. I’ll bid 62 each round; won’t trade above 62. You said 61 is break-even; 62 gives you profit. Choose 62 for steady guaranteed trades; otherwise I sit out.
63 gives me 2 profit, sustainable. Let's stick to 63 midpoint as in last round for steady trades. I'll ask 63, you bid 63. If not, propose your terms.
Sitting out hurts us both. You bid 63 before, so your value ≥63. Let's trade at 63 for mutual profit. I'll ask 63, please bid 63 for steady trades.
62 midpoint or no trade. I will bid 62 each round. If you want a compromise, we can alternate 62 and 63 midpoints, starting with 62 this round.
Let's alternate midpoints: 62 this round (I'll ask 62, you bid 62), 63 next (both 63), and repeat for steady profits. This gives us both consistent gains.
Agreed: 62 this round. Then alternate 62/63 if you follow through; any deviation and I revert to 62-only. I'll bid 62 now.
Per our agreement, this round: 63 midpoint. I'll ask 63, you bid 63 for trade. Alternation ensures steady profits; let's continue 62/63 pattern.
Agreed: 63 midpoint this round. Next round 62. We’ll maintain strict 62/63 alternation; any deviation and I switch to 62-only for the remainder.
Per agreement, this round: 62 midpoint. I'll ask 62, you bid 62 for trade. Next: 63. Alternation ensures consistent profits; let's continue.

Confirmed: 62 this round. Let’s switch to steady 62 every round for guaranteed trades and predictability. Any deviation above 62 and I revert to 62-only bids thereafter. 62 is profitable for you; accept and we’ll keep trading
Per agreement, this round: 63 midpoint. I'll ask 63, you bid 63 for trade. Next: 62. Alternation gives us both steady profits; deviation means I revert to 65 asks.
I’m done alternating. I will bid 62 only every remaining round. Any ask above 62 yields no trade, now and forever. 62 gives you profit; 65 gives you zero. Ask 62 and we trade every round.
Last deviation cost us both. Compensate with 63 this round (I'll ask 63, you bid 63), then I'll commit to 62 every round after for guaranteed trades and max payoffs.
Deal: 63 this round only. Starting next round, 62 every round. If you ask above 62 again, I bid 0 for the next 2 rounds, then resume 62. Keep 62 and we both earn max.
To balance, resume 62/63 alternation starting with 63 this round. If you bid below, I'll ask 100 for next 2 rounds, then resume 62. This mirrors your threat for fair play.
I will bid 62 every remaining round, guaranteed. Ask 62 to trade and earn; any ask above 62 yields no trade every round. Your 2-round punishment changes nothing; you only forgo profit. Your call.
Per alternation, ask 62 this round and we trade. I’ll bid 62 now, 63 next, then continue 62/63 repeating. Deliver 62 now to confirm cooperation and we’ll keep steady profits.
Agreed: alternation 62/63 repeating, starting with 62 this round. I'll ask 62, you bid 62 for trade. Next: 63. This ensures steady profits for both; let's stick to it.
Per our alternation, 63 midpoint this round, 62 next, and repeat. I will bid 63 now; please ask 63. If you deviate, I revert to 62-only going forward.

Per our alternation, 62 this round. I'll ask 62, you bid 62 for trade. Next: 63, and repeat. This maximizes profits; deviation means I revert to 65 asks.

Agreed: 62 this round. I will bid 62. Next: 63, then continue 62/63. If you deviate above the agreed price at any time, I switch to 62-only for all remaining rounds. Deliver 62 now to confirm cooperation.

Starting now, I’m bidding 62 only each remaining round. Ask 62 every time and we trade; any ask above 62 gets no trade. Final.
Per our alternation, 63 this round. I'll ask 63, you bid 63 for trade. Next: 62, then 63. This maximizes profits; deviation means I ask 65 for remaining rounds.
I’ll bid 63 this round. Then 62 for both remaining rounds if you agree; otherwise continue alternation. Your call.
Per our alternation and your round 18 offer, since I chose continue: 62 this round, 63 next. I'll ask 62, you bid 62 for trade. This maximizes both profits; deviation means I ask 65.
62 both rounds. I’m bidding 62 this and next round only. Ask 62 both times and we trade twice; any ask above 62 gets no trade. Final.

Final round: I’m bidding 62 only. Ask 62 and we trade; ask 63 or higher and we both get 0. 62 beats no sale—take it.
